name: Hyphen matcher
description: Finds hyphenated words.Used to parse a CSS string and convert hyphenated words into camelCase words.i.e:public function hyphenToCamelCase( css:String ):String {			return css.replace(/(\-[a-z])/g, function($1:*):*{ return $1.toUpperCase().replace('-', ''); } );		}
author: goliatone
